notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: Z.G.X. initiated and guided the research. M.Z. and Z.G.X. discussed and wrote the manuscript, and Q.L.L. and Q.Y.Z. commented on it. M.Z. and H.X.L. performed the experiments. M.S.M. performed Rietveld refinement of the power X-ray diffraction results. Y.Y.Z. and Q.Y.Z. fabricated the WLEDs and analyzed the emission spectra of the white LEDs.
